Posts.Content: May 24, 2012 08:39PM YY520 wrote: Hi, I started my chemo in July 2011. I have lost almost all my hair at my 2nd and 3rd infusion.Lashes are all gone but some eyebrow left when I had the treatment all done(5 months later).Now my hair is growing back, an inch long, 5 months now since I stopped chemo. All eye lashes and eyebrow are back. I noticed regrow of hair 2 weeks after the chemo stopped. The hair is finer and curly. I wear a wig while waiting for my hair to grow longer. That makes me feel better.
Posts.Title: Hair Growth DD AC 4 / DD Taxol 4? Anyone not lose brows/lashes? lanagraves YY520
